  • Constructor Details

    • Fuel

      public Fuel​(processing.core.PImage image, double x, double y, double width, double height, String name, double weight)
      Constructs a fuel object
      Parameters:
      image - the image of the specific type of fuel
      x - the x-coordinate of fuel
      y - the y-coordinate of the fuel
      width - the width of the image of the fuel
      height - the height of the image of the fuel
      name - the name of the fuel
      weight - how much the fuel weighs
